languages.text: "Что же, вы явно захотите обсудить это происшествие, {name}". {n}На лице Хейнрикса впервые за весь разговор появляются эмоции — ожидание неприятной беседы.{/n} "Но, полагаю, не сейчас — сейчас вам будет полезнее отдохнуть и осмыслить слова Лорд-инквизитора в одиночестве. Доброй ночи, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Что же, вы явно захотите обсудить это происшествие, {name}". {n}На лице Хейнрикса впервые за весь разговор появляются эмоции — ожидание неприятной беседы.{/n} "Но, полагаю, не сейчас — сейчас вам будет полезнее отдохнуть и осмыслить слова Лорд-инквизитора в одиночестве. Доброй ночи, Вольный Торговец".

languages.text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: "Что же, вы явно захотите обсудить это происшествие, {name}". {n}На лице Хейнрикса впервые за весь разговор появляются эмоции — ожидание неприятной беседы.{/n} "Но, полагаю, не сейчас — сейчас вам будет полезнее отдохнуть и осмыслить слова Лорд-инквизитора в одиночестве. Доброй ночи, Вольный Торговец".

traits.locale_text: "Well, I imagine you'd like to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

"Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: 「さて、何が起きたかを話してもらおうか、{name}」{n}このやりとりの間、今初めてハインリックスの顔に感情がにじむ。不快な会話になるのを予期しているようだ。{/n}「だが、今はやめておこう...今は身体を休め、ロード・インクィジターの言葉を自分の中で考えるといい。よい夜を、自由開拓者」
languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: 「さて、何が起きたかを話してもらおうか、{name}」{n}このやりとりの間、今初めてハインリックスの顔に感情がにじむ。不快な会話になるのを予期しているようだ。{/n}「だが、今はやめておこう...今は身体を休め、ロード・インクィジターの言葉を自分の中で考えるといい。よい夜を、自由開拓者」

languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, ." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

languages.text: “你肯定迫不及待，想要讨论刚刚发生的事情，{name}。”{n}在这场对话中，这还是海因里希第一次流露出明显的情绪。他似乎已经笃定，接下来要面对一场令人不快的对话。{/n}“不过，我猜现在还不是时候。你要好好休息，仔细斟酌斟酌大审判官的话。祝你晚安，行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: “你肯定迫不及待，想要讨论刚刚发生的事情，{name}。”{n}在这场对话中，这还是海因里希第一次流露出明显的情绪。他似乎已经笃定，接下来要面对一场令人不快的对话。{/n}“不过，我猜现在还不是时候。你要好好休息，仔细斟酌斟酌审判长的话。祝你晚安，行商浪人。”

languages.text: «Bueno, está claro que querrá hablar de lo que acaba de suceder, {name}». {n}Por primera vez en toda esta conversación, ves una emoción en el rostro de Heinrix: tiene la cara de alguien que espera tener una conversación muy desagradable.{/n} «Pero imagino que ahora no. En este momento, será mejor que descanse y medite las palabras del Lord Inquisidor. Le deseo buenas noches, Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, está claro que querrá hablar de lo que acaba de suceder, {name}». {n}Por primera vez en toda esta conversación, ves una emoción en el rostro de Heinrix: tiene la cara de alguien que espera tener una conversación muy desagradable.{/n} «Pero imagino que ahora no. En este momento, será mejor que descanse y medite las palabras del Lord Inquisidor. Le deseo buenas noches, Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: « J'imagine que vous allez vouloir discuter de ce qui vient de se passer, {name}. »{n}Pour la première fois depuis le début de l'entretien, le visage d'Heinrix laisse transparaître ses émotions : il a l'air de quelqu'un qui s'attend à passer un mauvais moment.{/n} « Mais pas tout de suite. Pour l'heure, il vaut sans doute mieux que vous vous reposiez et que vous preniez le temps de réfléchir en privé aux paroles du seigneur inquisiteur. Je vous souhaite une bonne nuit, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que vous allez vouloir discuter de ce qui vient de se passer, {name}. »{n}Pour la première fois depuis le début de l'entretien, le visage d'Heinrix laisse transparaître ses émotions : il a l'air de quelqu'un qui s'attend à passer un mauvais moment.{/n} « Mais pas tout de suite. Pour l'heure, il vaut sans doute mieux que vous vous reposiez et que vous preniez le temps de réfléchir en privé aux paroles du seigneur inquisiteur. Je vous souhaite une bonne nuit, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: "Nun, Ihr werdet mit Sicherheit darüber reden wollen, was gerade passiert ist, {name}." {n}Zum ersten Mal während der gesamten Unterhaltung zeigt sich in Heinrix' Gesicht so etwas wie eine Emotion – er sieht aus wie jemand, der ein unangenehmes Gespräch erwartet.{/n} "Aber nicht jetzt, nehme ich an – jetzt solltet Ihr ausruhen und für Euch selbst über die Worte des Großinquisitors sinnieren. Ich wünsche Euch eine gute Nacht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, Ihr werdet mit Sicherheit darüber reden wollen, was gerade passiert ist, {name}." {n}Zum ersten Mal während der gesamten Unterhaltung zeigt sich in Heinrix' Gesicht so etwas wie eine Emotion – er sieht aus wie jemand, der ein unangenehmes Gespräch erwartet.{/n} "Aber nicht jetzt, nehme ich an – jetzt solltet Ihr ausruhen und für Euch selbst über die Worte des Großinquisitors sinnieren. Ich wünsche Euch eine gute Nacht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: "Eh, az önce neler olduğunu konuşmak isteyeceğini tahmin ediyorum {name}." {n}Bu süreç boyunca ilk defa Heinrix'in yüzünde duygu ibareleri beliriyor. Tatsız bir konuşmaya dâhil olacağını bekleyen birinin yüz ifadesine sahip.{/n} "Yine de şimdilik dinlenmen ve Lord Engizisyoncu'nun dediklerini kendi kendine değerlendirmen daha iyi olur. İyi geceler diliyorum Hür Tacir."
languages.original_text: "Well, you will obviously want to discuss what just happened, {name}." {n}For the first time during the entire exchange, emotion creeps into Heinrix's face — he looks like someone who is expecting an unpleasant conversation.{/n} "But not now, I presume — right now it would be better for you to rest and think on the Lord Inquisitor's words in private. I bid you good night, Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: "Eh, az önce neler olduğunu konuşmak isteyeceğini tahmin ediyorum {name}." {n}Bu süreç boyunca ilk defa Heinrix'in yüzünde duygu ibareleri beliriyor. Tatsız bir konuşmaya dâhil olacağını bekleyen birinin yüz ifadesine sahip.{/n} "Şimdilik yine de dinlenmen ve Lord Engizisyoncu'nun sözlerini kendi kendine değerlendirmen daha iyi olur. İyi geceler diliyorum Hür Tacir."
